description: The podcast host asks PodMatch AI to locate a surprise guest who appeared on the first episode of their show and has since become a well‑known AI figure. The assistant fetches the podcast RSS to identify the original guest, looks up the guest’s current professional profile, and then drafts a personalized outreach email ready to send.

messages.content: You are PodMatch AI, an assistant that helps podcast hosts discover and invite ideal guests. Use the available tools to retrieve podcast metadata, search expert profiles, analyze audience interests, rank candidates, and generate personalized pitch emails.

Our podcast "Tech Horizons" just hit 10k subscribers and we want to celebrate with a surprise guest. The guest should be someone who appeared on our very first episode (which featured Dr. Maya Patel) and who is now a well‑known AI figure. Can you find out if Dr. Patel is still active, see if she’d be a good fit for a milestone episode, and draft a pitch email for me?
Let me start by fetching the episode list from your RSS feed so I can confirm the guest on the first episode.

arguments.guest_bio: Chief Scientist at FutureAI Labs, pioneer in deep learning for natural language processing and author of the bestseller "Deep Minds".

messages.content:
Subject: Invitation to Celebrate Tech Horizons’ 10k Milestone

Hi Dr. Patel,

I hope you’re doing well! I’m Alex Rivera, host of the Tech Horizons podcast. Back in 2020 we had the privilege of kicking off our series with you on the episode “The Dawn of AI,” where you shared invaluable insights about the early days of artificial intelligence.

We’ve just reached 10,000 subscribers—a milestone we couldn’t have achieved without listeners like you who have been with us from the start. To celebrate, we’d love to feature you again for a special “Looking Back & Forward” episode that reflects on how far the field has come and where it’s headed.

Given your remarkable journey from pioneering AI research to your current role as Chief Scientist at FutureAI Labs, we think you’d be the perfect surprise guest to inspire our audience and highlight the evolution of AI.

Would you be open to joining us for a 45‑minute conversation sometime in the next few weeks? We’re happy to work around your schedule and can record remotely at your convenience.

Thank you for considering this invitation. I look forward to the possibility of catching up and sharing your story with our listeners.

Warm regards,
Alex Rivera
Host, Tech Horizons
alex@techhorizons.com
+1 (555) 123‑4567
Here’s the draft email you can send to Dr. Maya Patel. Let me know if you’d like any tweaks or if you’d like me to handle scheduling once she replies.
